CheatEntry.Description: "D2Client.dll - Cursor Hover X Position (Mouse Hover Coordinates)"
"D2Client.dll - Cursor Hover Y Position (Mouse Hover Coordinates)"
"D2Client.dll - GameType (gnGameType: 0=SP, 3=BNet Join, 6=OpenBNet Host, 7=OpenBNet Join, 8=TCP/IP Host, 9=TCP/IP Join)"
"D2Client.dll - Camera Shift X (Play Area Horizontal Offset)"
"D2Client.dll - Game Menu Open State (ESC Menu Visible)"
"D2Client.dll - Help Screen Open State (Help Panel Visible)"
"D2Client.dll - New Skill Button State (Skill Tab Button)"
"D2Client.dll - New Stats Button State (Character Stats Button)"
"D2Client.dll - Mercenary Revive Cost (Gold Required to Resurrect)"
"D2Client.dll - NPC Menu Amount (Number of Menu Options)"
"D2Client.dll - Overhead Text Trigger (Text Display Above Character)"
"D2Client.dll - Panel Offset X (UI Panel Horizontal Position)"
"D2Client.dll - Player Unit List (All Players in Game)"
"D2Client.dll - Recent Interact ID (Last Clicked Object ID)"
"D2Client.dll - Recent Trade ID (Last Trading Session ID)"
"D2Client.dll - Unit List Address (Game Objects List Pointer)"
"D2Common.dll - Armor Record Count (Number of Armor Types)"
"D2Common.dll - Auto Magic Affix Table (Magic Item Properties)"
"D2Common.dll - Inventory Record Count (Number of Inventory Types)"
"D2Common.dll - Item Description Count (Number of Item Descriptions)"
"D2Common.dll - Global Data Table (Core Game Data Pointer)"
"D2Gdi.dll - Bitmap Block Height (GDI Graphics Block Height)"
"D2Gdi.dll - Bitmap Block Width (GDI Graphics Block Width)"
"D2Gdi.dll - Cell Display Left (GDI Sprite Left Boundary)"
"D2Gdi.dll - Cell Display Right (GDI Sprite Right Boundary)"
"D2Lang.dll - Expansion String Address Table (LoD Text Addresses)"
"D2Lang.dll - Expansion String Index Table (LoD Text Indices)"
"D2Lang.dll - Patch String Address Table (Patch Text Addresses)"
"D2Lang.dll - Patch String Address Reference (Patch Text Address Pointer)"
"D2Lang.dll - Patch String Index Reference (Patch Text Index Pointer)"
"D2MULTI.dll - Chat Input Box (Chat Text Entry Field)"
"D2MULTI.dll - Game List Control (Multiplayer Game List UI)"
"D2Win.dll - Main Menu Mouse X (Menu Screen Mouse Position)"
"D2Win.dll - Main Menu Mouse Y (Menu Screen Mouse Position)"
"D2Lang.dll - Expansion String Address Reference (LoD Text Address Pointer)"
"D2Lang.dll - Expansion String Index Reference (LoD Text Index Pointer)"
"D2Common.dll - Magic Modifier Table (Magic Item Properties Count)"
"D2Common.dll - Rare Modifier Table (Rare Item Properties Count)"
"D2Lang.dll - String Address Reference (Base Text Address Pointer)"
"D2Lang.dll - String Index Reference (Base Text Index Pointer)"

DisassemblerComment.Comment: Check for /players being higher than 8 (nopped out)
ret for turn off waypoint gui and discovery
Was originally push 04, think this is what changes that back
Testing Rarity 2 = common 4 = magic 6 = rare 7 = unique? 8 = custom (orange)? 9 = set
EAX + 4 = Item ID (Can be used to make only certain items drop)
Pushing 4 to Item at offset 0, 4 means valid item?
Highest Item ID is 659, checking for that.
